channel.title: Legacy 2e: Life Among the Ruins: A Dawn Reflected On A Thousand Shards
channel.description:
The session is scheduled for 3 hours. The session will be recorded.
The End did not come for everyone at the same time. Many were pushed aside, buried, erased, discarded: exploited.
That was maybe what allowed you to survive, to linger on the Twilight. And return from the brink of extinction.
When the Long Night came, you fought - and you won. You are the inheritors of the World. What will you make of it?
Being able to attend each session is ideal, but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
This game abides by the Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy. The X-Card and Lines&Veils will be in use as well as any other safety tool players deem necessary.
